roleset.name: disappear
roleset.note: VANISH-V NOTES: Member of Vncls disappearance-48.2. (from vanish.01-v)

example.name: with temporal
example.text: By 1961, Mr. Mahfouz's idealism had vanished or become twisted, as it has in Said.

example.name: with locative
example.text: The clash of ideologies survives this treatment, but the nuance and richness of Gorky's individual characters have vanished in the scuffle.
example.arg: the nuance and richness of Gorky's individual characters
